headline: Stanley Black & Decker Warns of Lower Profits, Higher Prices, Due to Expected Tariff Increases
summary: Get ready to see more disclosures like one today by Stanley Black & Decker warning about lower corporate profits and higher prices for consumers.  To mitigate the impact of the tariff hikes, the company said it “is preparing to discuss potential price increases with its customers.”  Shares of Stanley Black & Decker were down about 2% this morning.
